beemovie

Class Program

  • Object
    • beemovie.Program

  • public class Program
extends Object
    This class is capable of creating the most imaginative Bee Movie memes ever conceived by us, humans.
    Since:
    Java 8.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arnau Marcos Almansa arnaumarcosalmansa@gmail.com

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        FYI: This is the main function.
        Parameters:
        args - Default parameters never used

      • wordLimits

        private static int[] wordLimits(String text,
                                int index)
        Finds, in the given text, the indexes of the start and the end of a word which contains the given index.
        Parameters:
        text - String where things happen and are happened
        index - Parameter that indicates the index of a character contained inside a word.
        Returns:
        Returns an int[] of length 2.
        Being int[0] the index of the space before a word and int[1] the index after the last character of the word.

      • meme

        private static String meme(String text)
        Converts a String into it's meme version.
        Each time it finds a word containing a 'b' or 'B', it replaces it with a substring from the beginning of the text til the end of the word containing the letter.
        Parameters:
        text - String that will be memetized.
        Returns:
        A String of the text memetized.
